author: VNExplorer
title: Rajinikanth Offers Prayers At Kedarnath, Badrinath Shrines
text: rajinikanth offers prayers at kedarnath, badrinath shrines Superstar Rajinikanth paid a sacred visit to the Kedarnath Dham and Badrinath Dham in Uttarakhand. In the visuals obtained by ANI, Rajinikanth can be seen offering prayers at the temple. Rajinikanth On Spirituality After arriving in Dehradun earlier, Rajinikanth expressed excitement about his spiritual trips. He said, "Every year I used to get new experience that made me continue my spiritual journey again and again. I believe even this time, (I) will get new experiences." He shared that such sacred trips help him grow. Rajinikanth also spoke about why spirituality is important. "The whole world needs spirituality, as it's important for every human being. Being spiritual means experiencing peace and tranquility, and fundamentally, it involves believing in God." Recently, Rajinikanth visited the BAPS Hindu Mandir in Abu Dhabi. Videos and pictures of Rajinikanth seeking blessing at the temple were posted on the official social media account of the BAPS Hindu Mandir. Rajinikanth was granted the golden visa by UAE's Department of Culture and Tourism. Vettaiyan Completed On the acting front, Rajinikanth has completed the shoot of his upcoming movie Vettaiyan, directed by TJ Gnanavel. Vettaiyan also stars Amitabh Bachchan. Vettaiyan, which is Rajinikanth's 170th film, is scheduled for a worldwide release in October this year. Earlier this month, Rajinikanth and Amitabh were seen filming a few scenes together in Mumbai.

author: George Dvorsky
title: Space Company tiene como objetivo entregar suministros cr√≠ticos a cualquier ubicaci√≥n en 90 minutos
text: En la d√©cada de 1980, FedEx ten√≠a un eslogan fant√°stico:‚Äú [Cuando, absoluta y positivamente, tiene que estar ah√≠ de la noche a la ma√±ana](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G0_NAWMJL8Q&ab_channel=ewjxn)‚Äù. Bueno, en situaciones como conflictos terrestres y escenarios de desastres, eso no es suficiente. Reconociendo la necesidad de un servicio de entrega ultrarr√°pido, Sierra Space, con sede en Colorado, est√° desarrollando actualmente un sistema para entregar suministros a pr√°cticamente cualquier lugar de la Tierra en solo 90 minutos. Sierra Space tiene un mont√≥n de proyectos interesantes en marcha ahora mismo, incluido su [Avi√≥n espacial Dream Chaser](https://gizmodo.com/sierra-space-dream-chaser-nasa-tests-private-spaceplane-1850985340) y un [estaci√≥n espacial comercial planificada](https://gizmodo.com/sierra-space-burst-test-life-space-station-module-1851188371).La semana pasada, la empresa tom√≥ por sorpresa a la industria cuando anunci√≥ otro ambicioso proyecto: una nueva plataforma llamada Ghost. La nueva nave espacial log√≠stica‚Äù, afirma la compa√±√≠a, servir√° como un ‚Äúsistema de protecci√≥n t√©rmica de √∫ltima generaci√≥n dise√±ado para el retorno seguro de peque√±as cargas √∫tiles‚Äù. desde el espacio‚Äù. El proyecto de log√≠stica espacial est√° dise√±ado para proporcionar servicios de mensajer√≠a bajo demanda para una variedad de clientes, incluidas operaciones de seguridad nacional. y ayuda durante desastres naturales. ‚ÄúPrevemos tener un inventario de veh√≠culos Sierra Space Ghost estrat√©gicamente ubicados y f√°cilmente accesibles y desplegables en 90 minutos en ubicaciones cr√≠ticas en cualquier lugar del La Tierra¬ª, dijo Tom Vice, director ejecutivo de Sierra Space, en un [declaraci√≥n](https://www.sierraspace.com/newsroom/press-releases/sierra-space-ghost-enters-flight-test-enabling-global-payload-delivery-in-90-minutes/). El sistema deber√≠a ser capaz de entregar suministros al ‚Äúpersonal de primera l√≠nea‚Äù dentro de los 100 metros del √°rea objetivo especificada, seg√∫n la empresa. . Este anuncio se produce tras el reciente establecimiento por parte de Sierra Space de su organizaci√≥n de Misiones y Servicios Orbitales, que se centra en soluciones innovadoras para la seguridad nacional. dice que ya se le han adjudicado 1.300 millones de d√≥lares en contratos prime para constelaciones de sat√©lites en el marco de esta iniciativa. Ghost se someti√≥ a una serie de tres pruebas de ca√≠da el 1 de febrero en las instalaciones de lanzamiento y aterrizaje de Space Florida. Estas pruebas incluyeron una ca√≠da terminal desde 2000 pies (610 metros) para evaluar la din√°mica del impacto, un descenso controlado en paraca√≠das desde 4000 pies (1219 metros) y una separaci√≥n del escudo y componentes de carga √∫til, mostrando la capacidad del veh√≠culo para devolver cargas √∫tiles de forma segura. Una vez que este programa se ponga en marcha, una nave espacial Ghost precargada esperar√° en √≥rbita hasta que se le indique volver a entrar. La carga puede incluir un elemento de supervivencia. kit, un bote inflable, raciones, armas y otros art√≠culos. Tras la activaci√≥n, la nave espacial se reorientar√≠a, comenzar√≠a su reingreso y use un escudo de protecci√≥n t√©rmica para soportar temperaturas de hasta 2000 grados Fahrenheit. Despu√©s del reingreso, un parafoil guiar√≠a la carga √∫til hacia el √°rea de aterrizaje designada. Cada sat√©lite tiene una vida √∫til esperada de cinco a√±os, despu√©s de lo cual ser√≠an retirados y desorbitados. [Art√≠culo relacionado:] [Firefly Aerospace establece un nuevo r√©cord de velocidad de lanzamiento para la misi√≥n de la Fuerza Espacial de EE. UU.] Es una idea interesante y √∫til, que tiene sentido dada nuestra capacidad cada vez mayor para alcanzar y trabajar en el espacio. tecnolog√≠a de respuesta, en la que [Los cohetes se pueden lanzar con 24 horas de antelaci√≥n.](https://gizmodo.com/space-force-rapid-launch-victus-nox-satellite-mission-1850404789)Esto realmente podr√≠a revolucionar nuestra capacidad de hacer llegar cosas a las personas que m√°s las necesitan, cuando es absolutamente necesario y positivo. estar all√≠ en un minuto caliente. Para m√°s vuelos espaciales en tu vida, s√≠guenos en [X](http://@gizspaceflight) y marcar los dedicados de Gizmodo [P√°gina de vuelos espaciales](https://gizmodo.com/science/spaceflight). Este contenido ha sido traducido autom√°ticamente del material original. Debido a los matices de la traducci√≥n autom√°tica, pueden existir ligeras diferencias. Para la versi√≥n original, [ haga clic aqu√≠](https://gizmodo.com/sierra-space-ghost-delivery-platform-90-minutes-1851420007).

author: beatrizmizuno
title: Com grave infec√ß√£o bacteriana, Claudia Alencar j√° respira sem aparelhos
text:
28/12/2023 - 18:46
O estado de sa√∫de de
Claudia Alencar continua grave, mas apresenta melhoras. Hospitalizada desde 17 de dezembro, a atriz de 73 anos passou por uma cirurgia na coluna lombar neste domingo, 24, devido a uma infec√ß√£o bacteriana.
Nesta quinta, 28, o hospital respons√°vel pela interna√ß√£o de Claudia atualizou seu boletim com boas not√≠cias: ela j√° respira sem ajuda de aparelhos.
‚ÄúA Sra. Claudia G Alencar vem mantendo melhora cl√≠nica ao longo dos √∫ltimos dois dias. Permanece hemodinamicamente est√°vel e sem suporte ventilat√≥rio, mas ainda inspirando vigil√¢ncia cont√≠nua devido √† gravidade da infec√ß√£o‚Äù, diz o relat√≥rio do Hospital S√£o Vicente Rede D‚ÄôOr, no Rio de Janeiro.
A cirurgia a qual a atriz foi submetida na v√©spera de Natal ‚Äî uma ‚Äúreabordagem de ferida operat√≥ria‚Äù, possivelmente proveniente de um procedimento feito no m√™s anterior ‚Äî foi bem-sucedida.
Claudia √© conhecida por seu papel em ‚ÄúTieta‚Äù, novela de 1989, na qual interpretou Laura. Seu pr√≥ximo trabalho √© ‚ÄúBeleza Fatal‚Äù, novela da HBO Max, que deve estrear em 2024.

author: Alex City Outlook
title: Tallapoosa County | alexcityoutlook.com
text: With the cold temperatures carrying Alabama through the winter, three local sheriff‚Äôs offices came together to donate outdoor heaters to the Tallapoosa County Girls Ranch. Beginning Feb. 6, the Alabama legislature is back in session with some big topics on the table, such as gaming, medical cannabis, education, voting and public safety. To Your Good Health is all about healthy resolutions and getting your mind, body and soul right throughout the new year. ‚ÄúChange Makers ‚Äì A Celebration of Black History‚Äù is starting this month as Reeltown‚Äôs art contest in observance of Black History Month. The recent cold wave has led to increased electricity usage, resulting in higher bills for many customers. According to a press release, Alabama Power is offering support through programs like Project SHARE, LIHEAP and ABC Trust Fund. For anyone Alabama Power serves facing difficulties, plea‚Ä¶ One dog is making the rounds to all the schools around Tallapoosa County. The Tallapoosa County Health Department in Dadeville is hosting a comprehensive eye exam on Jan. 25. A single-vehicle crash that occurred at 12:05 p.m. Wednesday, Jan. 10, has claimed the life of an Ashland man. At least two warming stations will be open in Tallapoosa County this weekend during the hard freeze warning. Editor‚Äôs Note: Each candidate running for political office is allowed one free questionnaire to be published in the newspaper. All other advertisements must be paid. These questionnaires are printed exactly as they are provided to Tallapoosa Publishers. ‚ÄúSince Day 1 we thought this could happen. Competition builds success. This will bring so much awareness.‚Äù ‚ÄúWe had better weather than we anticipated, which is always better for our plungers. The turnout was really good.‚Äù Across Alabama, the arts are not widely taught in schools. However, at Reeltown High School, the administration is trying to change that narrative. Community Christmas with LIFT Ministries had its biggest turnout this past Christmas season. The National Weather Service issued a slight risk for Tallapoosa, Coosa and Elmore counties. Editor‚Äôs Note: Each candidate running for political office is allowed one free questionnaire to be published in the newspaper. All other advertisements must be paid. These questionnaires are printed exactly as they are provided to Tallapoosa Publishers. Registration is now open for Tallapoosa County 4-H‚Äôs Poultry Project. The Tallapoosa County Sheriff‚Äôs Department is investigating a utility trailer theft that occurred in the county and seeks the public‚Äôs help in identifying the suspects, according to a CrimeStoppers press release. After approving January to be School Board Recognition month, the board paid it forward by showing gratitude for its teachers and support staff. With the March 2024 primary elections coming up, incumbent Tallapoosa County School Board member Matilda Woodyard-Hamilton is planning to run as an independent candidate for District 1. It‚Äôs official: Lake Martin finally has an animal advocacy group. From master gardener classes to agriculture career expos, the Tallapoosa County Extension Office hosted a variety of workshops and events this past year.

author: ABNewswire
title: Chocolate Flavor Market to Reach 22.10 USD Billion by 2032 with
text:
Chocolate Flavor Market to Reach 22.10 USD Billion by 2032 with 3.5% CAGR Driven by increasing popularity of chocolate flavoured products 02-27-2025 11:48 PM CET | Business, Economy, Finances, Banking & Insurance
Press release from: ABNewswire MRFR
Chocolate Flavor Market Research Report By Form (Powder, Liquid, Paste), By Application (Confectionery, Bakery & Patisserie, Dairy Products, Beverages), By Source (Natural, Synthetic), By Distribution Channel (Online, Offline), By Flavor Profile (Dark Chocolate, Milk Chocolate, White Chocolate, Caramel, Vanilla) and By Regional (North America, Europe, South America, Asia Pacific, Middle East and Africa) - Forecast to 2034
The global chocolate flavor market is poised for significant growth, with projections indicating an increase from USD 16.24 billion in 2025 to USD 22.10 billion by 2034, reflecting a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of approximately 3.5% during this period. This expansion is driven by evolving consumer preferences, innovative product developments, and emerging market trends.
The global Chocolate Flavor Market [ https://www.marketresearchfuture.com/reports/chocolate-flavor-market-23380 ] is experiencing steady growth, driven by increasing consumer demand for indulgent and versatile flavors across various food and beverage applications. Chocolate flavor is widely used in confectionery, bakery, dairy, beverages, and nutritional products, appealing to a broad consumer base. The market is witnessing a rise in premium and artisanal chocolate offerings, as well as a growing preference for natural and sustainably sourced cocoa. Regional demand varies, with Europe leading in consumption, while Asia-Pacific and North America are rapidly expanding due to urbanization and changing dietary habits. Innovation in plant-based, low-sugar, and functional chocolate products is further shaping market trends. However, challenges such as fluctuating cocoa prices and sustainability concerns remain key factors influencing market dynamics.
Image: https://www.abnewswire.com/upload/2025/02/ee6e7c87d443541db51c5c2ead360b24.jpg
Market Drivers
A primary catalyst for the chocolate flavor market's growth is the rising consumer inclination towards indulgent and flavorful food products. Chocolate's versatility has solidified its presence across various sectors, including confectionery, bakery, dairy, and beverages. The introduction of premium and artisanal chocolates, alongside low-sugar and dietetic variants, has broadened the market's appeal, catering to health-conscious consumers without compromising on taste.
Additionally, the increasing demand for natural and organic flavors has prompted manufacturers to explore sustainable and ethically sourced cocoa. Consumers are becoming more aware of the environmental and social impacts of their purchases, leading to a preference for products that align with their values. This shift is encouraging companies to adopt transparent practices and certifications that highlight their commitment to sustainability.
Regional Insights
Europe stands out as a dominant player in the chocolate flavor market, anticipated to contribute 53% of the global growth during the forecast period. Countries such as the UK, Germany, and France are at the forefront, driven by a strong demand for natural chocolate flavors. The region's rich tradition of chocolate consumption, combined with a growing awareness of the benefits of natural ingredients, has bolstered this trend.
In contrast, markets in Asia-Pacific and North America are experiencing rapid growth due to urbanization, increased disposable incomes, and the westernization of diets. These regions are witnessing a surge in demand for both traditional and innovative chocolate-flavored products, reflecting diverse consumer preferences and a willingness to experiment with new flavors.
"Request Free Sample" - Obtain a complimentary sample of our report to assess its quality and relevance to your requirements: https://www.marketresearchfuture.com/sample_request/23380
Emerging Trends
Several key trends are shaping the future of the chocolate flavor market:
Sustainable Farming Practices: There's a growing emphasis on sustainable cocoa farming methods, such as regenerative agriculture and precision fermentation. These practices aim to reduce environmental impact and ensure a stable supply chain, resonating with eco-conscious consumers.
Plant-Based Innovations: The rise of vegan and flexitarian diets has led to an increased demand for plant-based chocolate alternatives. Consumers are seeking products that offer the indulgence of traditional chocolate while adhering to their dietary preferences. This trend is particularly prominent in regions like China and Italy, where significant growth is anticipated.
Incorporation of Power Ingredients: To enhance the nutritional profile of chocolate products, manufacturers are infusing them with ingredients like nuts, seeds, and adaptogens. This approach caters to health-conscious consumers looking for functional benefits in their indulgent treats.
Nutritional Balance: There's a noticeable shift towards chocolates with reduced sugar content and increased fiber, aligning with the global trend of health and wellness. Brands are reformulating products to meet these demands without compromising on taste.
Challenges
Despite the positive outlook, the chocolate flavor market faces challenges, notably the volatility of cocoa prices. In recent times, companies like Barry Callebaut have reported lower sales volumes due to soaring cocoa costs, leading to delayed orders and renegotiations with clients. Similarly, Lindt & Sprungli has implemented price hikes to offset these increased raw material expenses. These fluctuations can impact profit margins and consumer prices, potentially affecting demand.
Moreover, the phenomenon of "skimpflation," where companies alter recipes to reduce costs, has emerged as a concern. Brands may substitute or reduce premium ingredients, which can lead to a decline in product quality and consumer trust. This practice underscores the importance of maintaining transparency and quality to retain customer loyalty.

Future Outlook
The chocolate flavor market is on a trajectory of steady growth, fueled by innovation and adaptability to consumer preferences. Companies are investing in research and development to introduce new flavors and formulations that cater to diverse tastes and dietary requirements. The integration of technology in production processes is also enhancing efficiency and product consistency.
As sustainability becomes increasingly central to consumer choices, brands that prioritize ethical sourcing and environmentally friendly practices are likely to gain a competitive edge. Collaborations with local farmers and communities not only ensure a reliable supply chain but also foster positive brand image and consumer trust.
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ):
What is the market size of the Chocolate Flavor Market?
The chocolate flavor market is expected to reach USD 22.10 billion by 2034, exhibiting a CAGR of 3.5% during the forecast period (2025-2034).
Which region is the largest consumer of chocolate flavors?
Europe is the largest consumer of chocolate flavors, accounting for a market share of 38.5% in 2024. The Asia-Pacific region is expected to witness the highest CAGR of 4.2% during the forecast period.

author: PA News Agency
title: Thousands of homes remain without power in wake of Storm Gerrit | Oxford Mail
text:
Thousands of homes remain without power as the post-storm cleanup begins in the wake of Storm Gerrit.
Around 1,500 homes in Scotland experienced their second night without power in Scotland while a lightning strike hit supplies in Wales on Thursday.
Power company Scottish and Southern Electricity Networks said it had restored supply to more than 46,000 properties that lost power due to the storm, with people in the north east and Shetland worst affected.
‚ö° We've now restored power to 46k customers #stormgerrit üè† 1.5k will be off overnight, we're giving help & advice.üë∑ Teams are working tonight to clear debris hindering access to faults.‚òï Full details of vans serving hot meals from 9am tomorrow are at https://t.co/HSBcM400Fh pic.twitter.com/pnHIApyUvC
‚Äî Scottish and Southern Electricity Networks (@ssencommunity) December 28, 2023
They said the remaining homes should be reconnected on Friday with welfare vans serving hot food and drink to affected customers from 9am.
Operations director Andy Smith said: ‚ÄúThis has been a difficult couple of days for the communities affected and I‚Äôm grateful to them for their patience and support as our teams work extremely hard to restore power.‚Äù
National Grid UK said 36,000 properties were without power in Ceredigion on Thursday after lightning struck.
Storm Gerrit strongest gusts. See story WEATHER Gerrit. Infographic PA Graphics. An editable version of this graphic is available if required. Please contact graphics@pamediagroup.com. Three men died after their 4√ó4 vehicle was submerged in the River Esk, near Glaisdale, on Thursday, North Yorkshire Police said.
A supercell thunderstorm moved across the northwest of England on Thursday after a similar storm is thought to have resulted in a tornado that damaged homes in Greater Manchester on Wednesday.
Around 100 properties were damaged by what police called a ‚Äúlocalised tornado‚Äù in Stalybridge, Tameside and in the badly-hit village of Carrbrook.
Hayley McCaffer, 40, who lives in Carrbrook, told the PA news agency that some of her neighbours‚Äô houses ‚Äúare an absolute disaster‚Äù with missing roofs and ‚Äúsquished‚Äù cars.
Damage will be covered by standard property insurance policies, the Association of British Insurers has said.
Screengrab taken from PA Video of a damaged gate in Stalybridge after the Tameside tornado (Richard McCarthy/PA) ScotRail said many lines have been reopened but urged passengers to check for the latest information before travelling, a message echoed by LNER, Avanti West Coast and London Northwestern Railway who suspensed or cancelled services due to damage or system faults.
Friday will see significant disruption for travellers wishing to travel on the London Euston and Watford Junction lines with services expected to be up and running by the end of the day.
In Wales, the aftermath of the recent severe weather will see rail services hampered until Monday.
üå¶Ô∏è Blustery showers are possible on Friday morning, with these most likely in the north and west. Many of us will also see some sunshine and some places may stay dry.
üå¨Ô∏è Still windy in northern England and later Shetland, with gales possible, but otherwise somewhat less windy. pic.twitter.com/hInP8LNF2c
‚Äî Met Office (@metoffice) December 28, 2023
Ferry services also experienced cancellations and delays due to storm activity with operator DFDS confirming sailings between Dover and France were delayed due to strong winds in the English Channel.
Air travel in and out of the UK saw cancellations but most services have returned to normal.
The Met Office reported the worst of Storm Gerrit had passed with the last few days of 2023 forecast to be unsettled with strong winds, rain and even snow on higher ground.
Met Office chief forecaster Steven Ramsdale said: ‚ÄúHeavy rain will spread across all but the far north on Saturday, affecting similar areas previously affected by Storm Gerrit. However, this rainfall will be a step down from that seen during Storm Gerrit.‚Äù
